TitleEnglish: Detective Conan: The Fist of Blue Sapphire
SummaryEnglish: The world's greatest blue sapphire, the "blue lapis fist", said to have sunk in a pirate ship in the late 19th century, on the coasts of Singapore has been found and put on display. A local millionaire plots to retrieve it, and when it's exhibited in an exhibition at the Singaporean Marina Sands hotel, a murder takes place.
Aliases: Case Closed: The Fist of Blue Sapphire
劇場版 名探偵コナン 紺青の拳(フィスト)
